    function

    Data session API

    4 minute read

    LINE Planet provides data session for an application to communicate application data. For example, an application sends or receives text message to implement...

    Shared contents API

    2 minute read

    Contents share api lets an application share time related data with peers. The shared data could be anything but 1KBytes limited size.

    Presentation - Screen share

    1 minute read

    Presentation means a presenter shares his or her screen to show a material such as slides to the other call peer(s).

    LINE Planet Function Table

    1 minute read

    Support: Support the function NY: Not Yet. But have plan. NA: Not Available. We don’t have plan. WebRTC: Follow WebRTC’s

    Enable video call from audio call

    1 minute read

    An application can enable video call in the middle of an audio call. The API procedure for enabling video call is differ depends on the call service type.

    Mute share and control

    less than 1 minute read

    Mute means to disable sending audio from the local microphone device.

    Network Unavailable Event

    less than 1 minute read

    Network Unavailable Event notifies the network becomes unstable. The LINE Planet call quality could be bad when the network has a problem. LINE Planet will ...

    Hold

    less than 1 minute read

    An application can hold or unhold to send its own media streams with related events. The behavior of hold API differs depends on the call service type.

    Service Ticket ID

    less than 1 minute read

    An application can share an application data between AppClient an AppServer in making a call or joining a conference. stid is the field name that delivers t...

    Send Short Data

    less than 1 minute read

    An application can send limited size data during communication. This supports both 1:1 call and conference call communication types. If the communication i...

    Responder preparation status

    less than 1 minute read

    Responder preparation status gives callee a time to ready for communication. In 1:1 call, callee may need to time to prepararation to check her/his face or...

    Call Init Data

    less than 1 minute read

    In 1:1 call, a caller can send limited size data to a callee before the callee accepts the call.

    2 minute read

    less than 1 minute read
